page.title: 14BMX Racing
page.content: In Grovehill there is a BMX track. BMX stands for{Bicycle Motor Cross. There is a starting gate at the top of the ramp. The starter calls "This time!", "Riders ready!", "Pedals ready!" "Go!". You race round a track, over jumps and into ditches. There are{different types of jumps ie. Speed jump, whoops (which are two bumps together), a burm, a bomb hole (which is a ditch) and a table top. {<< BMX >> << BMX >> << BMX >> Members are charged 50 pence (non- members 75 pence) to take part in a race meeting. A BMX bicycle can cost from around Â£60 to Â£700. You need protective gear to race, including helmets, padded trousers and top. There are monthly race meetings on Sundays which are open to everyone. People come from all over London and the Midlands.
